title: Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Suite 10.1.25.294 (x86-x64)
description:
Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Suite is an all-in-one suite to completely protect, maintain and manage your PC! Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Suite provides you with all of the tools you need to manage todayÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s hard drives, including partitioning solutions, backup and restore, optimization and defragmentation, hard drive disposal, boot management and system recovery. This suite allows you to make fast migration to new HDDs, SSDs and virtual machines. Efficient disk maintenance and optimization are available too. Paragon Hard Disk Manager 15 Suite also allows you to manage multiple operating systems (up to 16) on a hard drive. Protect your entire PC, including the operating system, applications, your settings, and all data files with easy-to-use backup tools.

What's new in version 15:
- (New) Agentless MS Hyper-V Backup
- (New) Secure data wiping Ã¢â‚¬â€œ even on SSDs
- Free Update* for Windows 10 Support!
- (New) Agentless protection of Hyper-V guest machines
- (New) File-level backup/restore for virtual containers (pVHD, VHD, VHDX, VMDK)
- (New) Paragon Recovery Media Builder 3.0
- (Update) Refactored P2V Restore Wizard
- (New) Revised Graphical User Interface (GUI)
- (New) Wiping SSD
